entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When using a Blazor MAUI Hybrid app on a Windows 11 touchscreen device, mouse input stops working after using touch input once. #28092
  • Add performance logging and suggestions to .NET MAUI rendering #28091
    .NET 10 Planning
  • RequestedThemeChanged not invoked after Android 14 theme change #28089
  • No ProcessTerminated on iOS when WebView dies and turns blank #28088
  • Maps control inside ScrollView on Android does not size correctly #28085
  • Keyboard Overlay Issue: Input Fields Hidden Behind Native Keyboard in Hybrid WebView App #28083
  • Android AND IOS Apps crashes in Release Build when activating theTrimMode Switch #28082
  • CollectionView Does Not Scroll When EmptyView Exceeds Screen Size #28080
  • Shell crashes when tapping on flyout menu item after items replaced #28078
    Backlog
  • System.InvalidOperationException: NavigationManager cannot be null here #28075

Closed

  • MAUI very slow on physical android devices #18838
    Backlog
  • CollectionView lagging on start scrolling for Android #8919
  • [MacCatalyst] Picker control Focused and Unfocused events does not trigger whether focusing manually or programmatically. #27957
  • APK cannot install on Android 13 #28067

PullRequests

Created

  • Support XmlnsDefinitionAttribute in "this" assembly #28090
  • Make HybridWebViewHandler throw JS exceptions in C# by default #28086
  • Move to Microsoft.Testing.Platform #28084
    community ✨
  • Fix Visibility Issues #28081
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Improve PropertyMapper performance #28077
    community ✨, t/perf
  • [ci] Fix provisioning #28076
    testing-infrastructure, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix for Item should scrolled based on the GroupHeaderTemplate #28074
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Optimize formatted labels #28073
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-label, t/perf
  • Fix Path Rendering Issue Inside StackLayout When Margin Is Set #28071
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Housekeeping] Controls sample navigation crash - fix #28069
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨

Merged

  • [Testing] Resolved Shell TabBar DeviceTests CI failures on macOS #28072
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [MacCatalyst] Picker focus events #27973
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-picker, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Implement the option to change system theme on Appium #28025
    area-testing
  • [code style] Prefer file-scope namespaces #28040
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-architecture, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28068
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Revert "[ci] Run provisionator devdiv" #28079

Updated

  • Fix CSS Hot Reload on iOS device #27812
    area-tooling
  • Fixed Navigation Toolbar Visibility Issue on Dynamic Flyout Reset in FlyoutPage. #26693
    community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] SwipeView: SwipeItem.IconImageSource.FontImageSource color value not honored - fix #27389
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • [iOS] Empty View Overlapping Header in CollectionView with CollectionViewHandler2 #27988
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR5
  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10.0 #28044
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • Improve the performance of provisioning and running of device tests #28065
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Change iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation mechanism #26629
    area-layout, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed the CollectionView scroll the content inside Editor when tapping to get focus on it #27851
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] Disabled animation for NavigationBar on initial display #27080
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, do-not-merge, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • Skip useless handler mappings calls while connecting #27259
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment does not update at run time #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix up relevant CA1416 warnings - Set 3 #26751
    community ✨, area-controls-image, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] Essentials - preferences - prevent Application.Quit() from closing application before SharedPreferences in-memory changes are committed to disk. #27635
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • [iOS] [Android] Fix for the FontImageSource color is not applied properly to the Tab Icon #26757
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] ToolbarItem Icon Color #25102
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 19 #28060
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] DatePicker | Remove unnecessary UpdateDate() call in UpdateTextColor() #27811
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • Fix ScrollToPosition.Center behavior in ScrollView on iOS and MacCatalyst #26825
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed the ScrollbarVisibility issues #27613
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] White screen when changing the main page - fix #27361
    area-animation, platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • Fix for TabBar Navigation does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Investigating things for easier Aspire integration #24365
    area-core-hosting
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 15 #27965
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS][Shell][More Tab] Navigation from the 'More' tab - improvements #27932
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fixed improper rendering of ThumbimageSource in Slider #27472
    community ✨, area-controls-slider, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Thumb image improvements #27516
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-slider
  • Fixed FontImageSource icon color does not change in the TabbedPage when dynamically updated. #27742
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed ScrollView inside a Grid expands width past device screen when Rotated #27839
    community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] - Handle Dynamic Updates for CanDrag and AllowDrop in Drag and Drop Gesture #27845
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix: Support Clickable Hyperlinks in Labels with TextType HTML (iOS & Android) #27907
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [iOS] Fix for TableView cells become empty after adding a new cell with context actions #26326
    community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • Bump appium #27939
  • Fix iOS] Fix CarouselViewLoopNoFreeze so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #26053
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix up relevant CA1416 warnings - Set 1 #26696
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] Fix for Shell custom FlyoutIcon display problem #26016
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 17 #28011
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix "PlatformView cannot be null here" Exception using VisualStates #27877
    t/bug, area-xaml, platform/windows 🪟
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 18 #28033
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] Fix: Prevent duplicate Completed event when setting ReturnType in Entry #28018
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] MediaPicker: Use New Photo Picker #24027
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • [iOS] Gradient never returns to the correct color - fix #25910
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-border
  • Fixed the picker items do not appear when tapping on the picker after navigating through PushModalAsync #28003
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • [.Net10] [Proposal] [iOS] TabbedPage.AutoResizeIconsProperty #28046
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-tabbedpage
  • Fixed the FlyoutPage.Flyout Disappearing When Maximizing the Window on Mac Platform #26701
    area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix VerticalOffset Update When Modifying CollectionView.ItemsSource While Scrolled #26782
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the Header and Footer-Name textbox is cut off in collection view #26947
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
